str2: A primary particle of present time; 'now'; also as noun or adjective present or immediate.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To come, go.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
The tongue; by implication, a language.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

str2: To help, benefit, do good, be useful (to), profit. From the same as opheleia; to be useful, i.e. To benefit.

An unveiling, uncovering, revealing, revelation. From apokalupto; disclosure.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
Knowledge, doctrine, wisdom. From ginosko; knowing, i.e. knowledge.
